name: Bacon ALog
description: Bacon ALog is a delightful twist on a healthy meal, incorporating nutritious ingredients like Adlai Rice, fresh vegetables, and the irresistible taste of bacon. This recipe is perfect for those following a low-sugar diet and seeking healthified versions of their favorite dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, then set aside. This should take about 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the carrots, red bell pepper, bell pepper, and red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove the bacon and set aside on a paper towel to drain the excess grease.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet with the bacon grease, sauté the diced carrots, bell peppers, red onion, and minced garlic over medium heat until softened, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the cooked bacon into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice, sautéed vegetables, and chopped bacon in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the egg into the skillet and scramble until fully cooked, then stir into the rice mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
